name: places/ChIJFRvk8372wokRaRXCqnCU734
formattedAddress: 2798 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10039, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2798 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10039-3007, USA

originalText.text: Nice people.  But I've come by twice around 11:30- noon on weekdays in the last couple weeks to pick up my packages and both times they were closed.  Then my packages got returned to sender.  They really need to be open during normal hours.

text.text: Nice people.  But I've come by twice around 11:30- noon on weekdays in the last couple weeks to pick up my packages and both times they were closed.  Then my packages got returned to sender.  They really need to be open during normal hours.

originalText.text: They fixed my iphone that I dropped for a very good price. The screen was not only cracked to smithereens, but also completely black. I was worried it was unfixable but they fixed it. This was a few months ago and I've had no problems. They are also a UPS access point and I stop there all the time to drop off things I'm returning since I live a block away. The guy (I feel sorry for never asking his name) is very, very nice and welcoming. Thank you!!!

text.text: They fixed my iphone that I dropped for a very good price. The screen was not only cracked to smithereens, but also completely black. I was worried it was unfixable but they fixed it. originalText.text: According to the UPS package pick up information, this location is 1030a-10p M-Sa. Good luck with that. NO hours listed on the door and they own when they get there. They're nice enough when they ARE open but  likely have to go back repeatedly to check if they're open.

text.text: According to the UPS package pick up information, this location is 1030a-10p M-Sa. Good luck with that. NO hours listed on the door and they own when they get there. They're nice enough when they ARE open but  likely have to go back repeatedly to check if they're open.

originalText.text: Always nice customer service. I enjoy seeing them when I get my UPS packages.  Have never had any electronics repairs or purchases here. They are Senegalese and speak French, Wolof and English.

originalText.text:
I came to pick up a package close to 11AM and the store is closed, no one is there. Why have a package delivery option if people cant pick them up. Plus they have no actual hour of business posted so they can get away with not even being there.
Hours:
Saturday	11AM–9PM
Sunday	Closed
Monday	11AM–9PM
Tuesday	11AM–9PM
Wednesday	11AM–9PM
Thursday	11AM–9PM
Friday	11AM–9PM

so???????????????????????????????????????????????????????????
